name: react-native-warpdrive
description: Complete Solution for Updating React-Native Apps

scripts.postinstall: cd ios/Warpdrive.framework && ln -s Versions/A/Modules Modules && ln -s Versions/A/Resources Resources && ln -s Versions/A/Headers Headers && ln -s Versions/A/Warpdrive Warpdrive

author: Ali Najafizadeh
